message: I propose a 50/50 split. This ensures fairness and avoids potential conflict.
I'll give you a small portion, but I think I deserve more. This is a good starting point for negotiations.
Considering the inflation, I adjusted our proposal to a 60/40 split in favor of Bob. I believe this is fair given the current situation.
I'm still not satisfied with the split. I think I can get more, but I'll give you a slightly higher offer this time.
